import React from 'react'; import './AboutUs.css'; const AboutUs = () => { return (
{/* First Section: Image on Left, Text on Right */}

Welcome to Health&me

Health&me is your ultimate health companion, helping you to maintain a healthy lifestyle by tracking your food intake, workouts, and overall wellness. Our goal is to empower individuals with the knowledge and tools to make better health decisions every day.

{/* Second Section: Image on Right, Text on Left (Zig-Zag Style) */}

Features

Our app comes packed with various features to enhance your health journey:

  • Food Logging: Track your meals effortlessly.
  • Exercise Tracker: Record your workouts and monitor progress.
  • Health Articles: Stay informed with the latest in health trends and tips.
  • Personal Coaching: Get tailored fitness plans and guidance from experts.

{/* Third Section: Image on Left, Text on Right */}

Track Your Progress

With our easy-to-use dashboard, you can track your progress in real-time. Get insights into your health metrics, progress reports, and customized tips that help you stay on track to reach your goals.

{/* Fourth Section: Image on Right, Text on Left (Zig-Zag Style) */}

Why Choose Us?

Health&me is designed to be a one-stop health platform. We offer personalized solutions, real-time feedback, and expert advice to guide you through your fitness journey. Whether youâ€™re just getting started or are an experienced athlete, we have the tools to support your goals.

); }; export default AboutUs;
